## Степени и корни {#formulas_power}

<table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5">
   <tr> 
    <td width="50%" valign="top">
      $$a^n \cdot a^m = a^{n+m}$$
      $$\frac{a^n}{a^m} = a^{n-m}$$
      $$(a^n)^m = a^{nm}$$
      $$a^0 = 1$$
      $$a^{-n}=\frac{1}{a^n}$$
      $$(a \cdot b)^n = a^n \cdot b^n$$
      $$\Big(\frac{a}{b}\Big)^n = \frac{a^n}{b^n}$$
    </td>
    <td valign="top">
      $$a^{\frac{1}{n}}=\sqrt[n]{a}$$
      $$a^{\frac{m}{n}}=\sqrt[n]{a^m}$$
      $$\sqrt[n]{a \cdot b} = \sqrt[n]{a} \cdot \sqrt[n]{b}$$
      $$(a \cdot b)^{\frac{1}{n}} = a^{\frac{1}{n}} \cdot b^{\frac{1}{n}}$$
      $$\sqrt[n]{\frac{a}{b}} = \frac{\sqrt[n]{a}}{\sqrt[n]{b}}$$
      $$\Big(\frac{a}{b}\Big)^{\frac{1}{n}} = \frac{a^{\frac{1}{n}}}{b^{\frac{1}{n}}}$$
    </td>
   </tr>
</table>

 $$
x^n = a \Rightarrow x = 
\begin{cases}
\pm \sqrt[n]{a}, &\quad x \mod 2 = 0 \\ 
\sqrt[n]{a}, &\quad x \mod 2 = 1
\end{cases}
$$

## Логарифмы {#formulas_log}

$$\log_b a = c \Leftrightarrow a^c = b, a > 0, b > 0, b \neq 1$$

<table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5">
   <tr> 
    <td width="50%" valign="top">
    $$\log_a a = 1$$
    $$\log_c(ab) = \log_c a + \log_c b$$
    $$\log_c\Big(\frac{a}{b}\Big) = \log_c a - \log_c b$$
    </td>
    <td valign="top">
    $$\log_c 1 = 0$$
    $$\log_c a^b = b \log_c a$$
    $$\log_{c^b} a = \frac{1}{b} \log_c a$$
    </td>
   </tr>
</table>


## Модуль {#formulas_abs}

$$
|a| = 
\begin{cases}
a, &a \geq 0 \\
-a, &a < 0
\end{cases}
$$

$$|x| \leq a \Rightarrow -a \leq x \leq a \Leftrightarrow x \in [-a, a]$$

$$|x| \geq a \Rightarrow x \leq -a \wedge x \geq a \Leftrightarrow x \in (-\infty, -a] \cup [a, +\infty)$$
